entry.title: Personal list of street photographers
entry.summary: I share a list of street photographers that at one time or another have interested me. This is a dynamic list that I hope to…
entry.content:
I share a list of street photographers that at one time or another have interested me. This is a dynamic list that I hope to update over time. I regret that most of the websites referenced are in Spanish.

  • Alex Webb
    • https://www.xatakafoto.com/fotografos/alex-webb-el-fotografo-obsesionado-con-la-realidad
    • Vídeo sobre su forma de trabajar
    • https://www.rubixephoto.com/2017/07/05/mejora-fotografia-calle-street-photography-alex-webb/
  • Anders Petersen:
    • https://culturainquieta.com/es/foto/item/13254-las-duras-y-conmovedoras-fotografias-de-anders-petersen.html
    • https://cartierbressonnoesunreloj.wordpress.com/2018/05/16/anders-petersen-mas-alla-de-cafe-lehmitz/
  • Andre Kertész:
    • https://www.xatakafoto.com/historia-de-la-fotografia/andre-kertesz-maestro-maestros-que-tuvo-que-luchar-toda-su-vida-ver-reconocido-su-talento
    • https://culturafotografica.es/andre-kertesz-fotografo-con-luz/
  • Brassaï
    • https://www.xatakafoto.com/actualidad/brassai-primer-fotografo-que-fotografio-noche
    • https://clavoardiendo-magazine.com/mundofoto/panorama/brassai-fotografo-la-noche-paris/
    • https://clubdefotografia.net/grandes-fotografos-brassai/
  • Bruce Davidson
    • https://graffica.info/bruce-davidson/amp/
    • https://culturainquieta.com/es/foto/item/13313-20-fotografias-del-gran-bruce-davidson-para-retratar-el-ee-uu-de-1950.html
    • https://www.revistacactus.com/bruce-davidson-el-fotografo-humanista-con-los-pies-en-la-calle/
  • Bruce Gilden:
    • https://www.oldskull.net/fotografia/10-fotografias-imprescindibles-de-bruce-gilden/
    • https://culturafotografica.es/bruce-gilden-fotografia-callejera/
  • Carlos Pérez Siquier:
    • https://www.museoreinasofia.es/coleccion/autor/perez-siquier-carlos
    • https://www.centroperezsiquier.org/carlos-perez-siquier
  • Daido Moriyama:
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/2013/08/24/daido-moriyama-fotografo-callejero/
    • https://cartierbressonnoesunreloj.wordpress.com/2017/11/27/la-radiografia-de-daido-moriyama/
  • David Alan Harvey
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_KH5knaWlF8
    • https://culturafotografica.es/david-alan-harvey-blanco-negro/
    • https://www.davidalanharvey.com/
  • David Hurn
    • https://www.vice.com/es/article/xd9zwq/david-hurns-magnum-entrevista
    • http://www.cadadiaunfotografo.com/2012/02/david-hurn.html
    • https://www.lensculture.com/articles/david-hurn-the-picture-that-changed-my-life-interview-with-david-hurn
  • Constantine Manos
    • https://blogs.deia.eus/momentodecisivo/2011/07/28/constantine-manos-blanco-y-negro-y-color/
    • http://losgrandesfotografos.blogspot.com/2017/04/constantine-manos-1934.html
    • http://www.cadadiaunfotografo.com/2012/04/constantine-manos.html
  • Eamonn Doyle
    • https://clavoardiendo-magazine.com/mundofoto/panorama/eamonn-doyle-cicatrices-y-gigantes-en-las-calles-de-dublin/
    • https://www.theguardian.com/artanddesign/2016/jul/23/eamonn-doyle-street-photographer-dublin-arles-martin-parr
  • Elliot Erwitt
    • https://clubdefotografia.net/elliott-erwitt/
    • https://culturainquieta.com/es/foto/item/12751-la-mirada-unica-del-genialfotografo-elliott-erwitt.html
    • https://www.xatakafoto.com/fotografos/elliot-erwitt-un-clasico-de-la-fotografiacon-ironia-y-mucho-mas
  • Ernst Haas
    • https://culturafotografica.es/la-magia-del-color-ernst-haas/
    • http://blackkamera.com/letras-y-fotografia-44-ernst-haas/
    • http://blackkamera.com/letras-y-fotografia-44-ernst-haas/
  • Fan Ho
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/2016/07/03/galeria-fan-ho/
    • http://www.cadadiaunfotografo.com/2011/02/fan-ho.html
    • https://fanhophotography.com/index.html
    • https://culturainquieta.com/es/foto/item/603-fan-ho.html
  • Garry Winogrand
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/2014/12/06/garry-winogrand/
    • https://elpais.com/cultura/2018/04/26/babelia/1524751256_717739.html
    • https://www.newyorker.com/culture/photo-booth/how-garry-winogrand-transformed-street-photography
  • Henri Cartier-Bresson
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/galerias/galerias-henri-cartier-bresson/
    • https://moovemag.com/2017/02/cartier-bresson/
    • https://clubdefotografia.net/henri-cartier-bresson/
  • Harry Callahan
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/2012/05/04/galeria-harry-callahan/
    • http://losgrandesfotografos.blogspot.com/2017/01/harry-callahan-1912-1999.html
    • http://blackkamera.com/letras-y-fotografia-50-harry-callahan/
  • Harry Gruyaert
    • https://elpais.com/elpais/2017/12/20/album/1513773562_489364.html
    • https://www.xatakafoto.com/fotografos/harry-gruyaert-photographer-documental-para-conocer-mejor-al-maestro-europeo-color
    • http://time.com/harry-gruyaert-photographer-east-west/
  • Helen Levitt
    • https://graffica.info/helen-levitt/
    • https://culturacolectiva.com/fotografia/fotografias-de-helen-levitt
    • https://elpais.com/cultura/2017/10/19/babelia/1508414247_221719.html
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/2014/06/01/galeria-helen-levitt/
  • Ikko Narahara:
    • http://weremag.com/2016/09/06/ikko-narahara-silencio-y-preguntas/
    • https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ikk%C5%8D_Narahara
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/2016/07/25/galeria-ikko-narahara/
  • Jacques Henri-Lartigue
    • https://www.xatakafoto.com/fotografos/jacques-henri-lartigue-la-fotografia-como-reflejo-de-la-felicidad
    • http://hunterartmagazine.com/jacques-henri-lartigue/
    • https://bauldeloslibrosasombrosos.com/fotografia-y-libros/fotografia-y-libros-robert-doisneau/inge-morath/la-mirada-de-francesc-catala-roca/vivian-maier/henri-cartier-bresson-y-el-instante-decisivo/jacques-henri-lartigue/
    • https://elpais.com/elpais/2015/06/19/eps/1434729221_260608.html
  • Jeff Mermelstein
    • http://www.cadadiaunfotografo.com/2016/11/jeff-mermelstein.html
    • https://www.oldskull.net/fotografia/la-singularidad-por-las-aceras-de-nueva-york/
    • https://www.nordikamagazine.com/jeff-mermelstein/
  • Joel Meyerowitz
    • https://www.theguardian.com/artanddesign/2018/mar/07/photography-legend-joel-meyerowitz-phones-killed-sexiness-street-most-stunning-shots
    • https://www.rubixephoto.com/2014/05/11/joel-meyerowitz-el-mago-de-la-fotografia-callejera/
  • Joel Sternfeld
    • http://www.musas20.com/joel-sternfeld-el-colorel-instante-perfecto-museup/
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/2017/01/29/joel-sternfeld-galeria/
    • https://www.albedomedia.com/cultura/joel-sternfeld-after-a-flash-flood-rancho-mirage-california/
  • John Free
    • https://culturacolectiva.com/fotografia/fotografias-de-john-free-sobre-vagabundos-en-eu
    • http://www.cadadiaunfotografo.com/2017/02/john-free.html
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OKIUOX426Dw
  • Lee Friedlander
    • https://graffica.info/lee-friedlander/
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/2015/01/03/lee-friedlander-y-su-paisaje-social/
    • https://www.rubixephoto.com/2017/08/08/mejora-fotografia-calle-street-photography-lee-friedlander/
  • Mark Cohen
    • http://ojoscien.blogspot.com/2011/10/de-que-planeta-es-mark-cohen.html
    • https://i-d.vice.com/es/article/zmx8z8/fotografia-mark-cohen-frame
    • https://www.lensculture.com/articles/mark-cohen-dark-knees
  • Martin Parr
    • https://culturainquieta.com/es/foto/item/7732-martin-parr-el-foto-grafo-del-verano.html
    • http://www.tendenciasdelarte.com/la-doble-vida-de-martin-parr/
    • https://www.martinparr.com/
  • Mary Ellen Mark
    • https://culturainquieta.com/es/foto/item/6900-la-legendaria-fotografa-mary-ellen-mark.html
    • https://www.thesprucecrafts.com/mary-ellen-mark-biography-2688391
    • http://www.anothermag.com/art-photography/10820/the-remarkable-story-behind-mary-ellen-marks-shots-of-street-kid-tiny
  • Matt Stuart
    • https://culturainquieta.com/es/foto/item/14507-matt-stuart-el-arte-de-saber-estar-en-el-lugar-y-momento-precisos.html
    • http://www.mattstuart.com/photography/
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MhSaR5ckKZI
  • Narelle Autio
    • http://www.cadadiaunfotografo.com/2016/05/narelle-autio.html
    • https://lamiradafotografica.blogspot.com/2015/02/narelle-autio.html
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K4VY4S8tpx4
  • Ray Metzker
    • http://elpatiodeldiablo.blogspot.com/2012/06/vi-por-primera-vez-la-obra-de-ray.html
    • https://courbettmagazine.com/la-luz-segun-ray-metzker/
    • https://youtu.be/OUNDRDf39ts
  • Rebecca Lepkoff
    • https://culturacolectiva.com/fotografia/las-fotografias-de-rebecca-lepkoff
    • http://www.cadadiaunfotografo.com/2014/06/rebecca-lepkoff.html
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7p5NnkxZM_Y
  • Richard Kalvar
    • https://culturainquieta.com/es/foto/item/2067-richard-kalvar-de-magnum-photos.html
    • http://erickimphotography.com/blog/2014/04/07/18-lessons-richard-kalvar-has-taught-me-about-street-photography/
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eEEOyQgYRq0
  • Robert Doisneau
    • https://trianarts.com/grandes-fotografos-robert-doisneau-el-autor-de-el-beso/
    • https://drescuela.com/robert-doisneau/
    • http://www.rtve.es/m/alacarta/videos/la-noche-tematica/noche-tematica-robert-doisneau-traves-lente/4907239/?media=tve
  • Robert Frank
    • https://culturafotografica.es/robert-frank/
    • https://www.theartstory.org/artist-frank-robert.htm
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IzO1kcdeER0
  • Saul Leiter
    • https://www.xatakafoto.com/historia-de-la-fotografia/saul-leiter-artista-que-fotografio-a-cartier-bresson-avisarle
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g_LFML4SQM8
    • http://saulleiterfoundation.org/images_color.html
  • Sergio Larrain
    • https://elpais.com/cultura/2017/12/21/actualidad/1513860891_113690.html
    • https://www.infobae.com/america/cultura-america/2017/12/31/sergio-larrain-el-gran-fotografo-de-las-mil-vidas/

  • Shomei Tomatsu
    • https://culturainquieta.com/es/foto/item/14655-shomei-tomatsu-el-hombre-que-cambio-la-fotografia-japonesa-para-siempre.html
    • https://www.lavanguardia.com/cultura/20180813/451084341768/shomei-tomatsu-mirada-comprometida-cambio-fotoperiodismo-brl.html

  • Stephen Shore
    • https://oscarenfotos.com/2013/11/16/stephen-shore-de-la-superficie-a-las-profundidades/
    • https://elpais.com/cultura/2017/11/22/babelia/1511351148_256746.html
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T029CTSO0IE
  • Tony Ray Jones
    • http://www.cadadiaunfotografo.com/2012/01/tony-ray-jones.html?m=1

entry.title: Echo
entry.content: asasda

entry.title: Primer post
